name: zoltaroo-will-schedule-your-2010-bonnaroo-experience
title: “Zoltaroo” Will Schedule Your 2010 Bonnaroo Experience
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
First we waited for the lineup. Then we waited for the schedule. And now it’s here! Bonnaroo is only a few weeks away, and now it’s time to get planning for your weekend on the farm. Use yet another one of Bonnaroo’s fancy-schmancy new tools, Zoltaroo, to predict your schedule. Zoltaroo will take your favorite Bonnaroo artist and rank the rest of the artists playing each day to help you figure out who you want to see, but the choice is ultimately up to you. The click-to-add interface couldn’t be more simple to use, and it’s kind of fun to see what bands Zoltaroo thinks we should like.

The full schedule can be found here, if you’re not into the internet-mindreading business.
